title: Gratitude Expression
content:
To my amazing [NAME],

I wanted to take a moment to tell you how grateful I am to have you in my life. Your kindness, strength, and love inspire me every day to be a better person.

[PERSONAL MESSAGE]

With endless appreciation,
[YOUR NAME]

title: Thank You Note
content:
Dearest [NAME],

I don't say it enough, but I want you to know how much your presence in my life means to me. Your support and encouragement mean everything.

[PERSONAL MESSAGE]

With heartfelt thanks,
[YOUR NAME]
